About Preva

Preva Care is on a mission to revolutionize preventive healthcare by making it proactive, personalized, and accessible. Our digital health ecosystem empowers individuals with regular preventive check-ups, wellness insights, and actionable health recommendations. For businesses, we offer comprehensive B2B corporate health programs designed to enhance employee well-being and productivity through customized health plans backed by data-driven insights.
Why Join Us
Opportunity to work on advanced AI-driven healthcare solutions
Collaborative environment with a highly skilled in-house development team
Fast-paced learning with real-time mentorship and hands-on exposure
Quarterly performance-based appraisals and recognition for outstanding contributions
Work remotely with flexible structure while contributing to meaningful innovation in health-tech
Role Overview
Build and refine user interfaces with a strong focus on responsiveness and user experience
Identify and troubleshoot issues, ensuring performance, security, and scalability
Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and agile development cycles
Preferred Candidate Profile
Clear communication skills and ability to collaborate in a remote team environment
Quick learner with a proactive mindset and the ability to adapt to evolving requirements
Additional Details
Immediate joiners are preferred
Competitive compensation structure
Appraisals conducted every quarter for exceptional performance
A chance to work on impactful technology in the healthcare space
How to Apply

jd_requirements: Full Stack Developer (1–2 Years Experience) – AI-Focused Healthcare Platform | Immediate Joiners Preferred
Location: Remote | Employment Type: Full-Time
About Preva

Preva Care is on a mission to revolutionize preventive healthcare by making it proactive, personalized, and accessible. Our digital health ecosystem empowers individuals with regular preventive check-ups, wellness insights, and actionable health recommendations. For businesses, we offer comprehensive B2B corporate health programs designed to enhance employee well-being and productivity through customized health plans backed by data-driven insights.
Why Join Us
Opportunity to work on advanced AI-driven healthcare solutions
Collaborative environment with a highly skilled in-house development team
Fast-paced learning with real-time mentorship and hands-on exposure
Quarterly performance-based appraisals and recognition for outstanding contributions
Work remotely with flexible structure while contributing to meaningful innovation in health-tech
Role Overview

We are seeking a skilled and motivated Full Stack Developer with 1 to 2 years of professional experience. The selected candidate will play a key role in developing and enhancing our platform, working on both the front-end and back-end, with opportunities to contribute to innovative AI features within our healthcare ecosystem.
Responsibilities
Develop, maintain, and scale applications using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and React.js
Build and refine user interfaces with a strong focus on responsiveness and user experience
Collaborate with the development team to implement AI-integrated features
Identify and troubleshoot issues, ensuring performance, security, and scalability
Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and agile development cycles
Preferred Candidate Profile
1 to 2 years of experience in full-stack web development
Proficient in Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and React.js
Strong front-end development skills including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Solid problem-solving abilities with a logical and analytical approach
Clear communication skills and ability to collaborate in a remote team environment
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
Quick learner with a proactive mindset and the ability to adapt to evolving requirements
Additional Details
Immediate joiners are preferred
Competitive compensation structure
Appraisals conducted every quarter for exceptional performance
A chance to work on impactful technology in the healthcare space
How to Apply
Interested candidates should apply directly through LinkedIn with their latest CV.
